website_summaries.verdict: Max is a cheaper Nutro brand for puppies through seniors that cuts the grain for those who need it, and focuses on premium ingredients for core nutritional needs.
pros: Mini chunks are the perfect size for small dogs
Made for dogs of all ages
cons: Medium and larger breeds need a Nutro Max recipe without mini chunks

customer_reviews.title: A tad smaller than pea size.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really like this dog food kibble and it’s easy for them to chew. My dogs skin and coat have drastically improved. I noticed their feces turn white after a few days In the yard when my dogs void and there is relatively no horrible foul odor either which indicates a nice higher quality. I’m very happy with this dog food.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. I have a 2 year old German Shepard and a 2 and a half year old Black Mouth Cur. They love the small pieces this comes in compared to the larger full sized food. I wish the mini chunks came in other flavors so they could have some variety. My only issues are that the price fluctuates from anywhere from $20-$40, but most of the time is around $30. I also wish that I could subscribe in custom increments. I need the food every 3 weeks, but every 4 weeks is the lowest time frame I can choose. I find it easier just to order it when I need it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: It's not that I love it but my Cavachon and Frenchie do
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I love it but my Cavachon and Frenchie do :) I was getting the stuff from Target/grocery store due to convenience but remember I have Amazon Prime. This huge bag costs as much as a much smaller bag of decent food at the retail stores and got shipped to my house so I didn't have to lug it around the store, carry it to my car, and all of the other stuff that I am entirely too lazy for. My dogs tear stains have improved significantly since switching to Nutro Max :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sisley

customer_reviews.title: She thrives on this - no medical issues.
customer_reviews.text: Grand dog has been eating this for about 7 - 8 years now. Never has any digestive problems. Although she is a boarder collie mix, I have been feeding the mini chunks and she has no problems. Of course....she also gets a few Milk Bones along the way...... Fast home delivery means no lugging for me to the car and then up the stairs into the house. SO GLAD it is available here.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Food at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: My go to dog food. My Lhasa Apsa has skin issues and once I switched her to this food in 2010 all the itching, flaking and digging stopped within a week. I've tried switching it out for something else a couple of times and within a couple if weeks the skins problems are back.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Costa

customer_reviews.title: Had to switch to the mini chunk...here's why
customer_reviews.text: My dog apparently loves this food. We used the normal size kibble and sometimes she would eat so fast that she would choke on it (even with a slow-feed bowl). Now I'm using this mini chunk and I think it's helping her from choking on the larger kibble sizes. She still eats crazy-fast, but at least I feel a little more at ease about it. lol
customer_reviews.author: Nerditup

customer_reviews.title: Good for us.
customer_reviews.text: Look man, my dog will eat pretty much anything. We’ve never had to wrap meds in cheese. We’ve never had to be be picky about the food. So as far as taste I can’t attest to anything but my dog does have a habit of eating like she’s just been released from the gulags and hasn’t seen a complete meal in years. The smaller sized kibble confuses her and forces her to eat slower and reduces the risks of her throwing up. On top of being a glutton she also had a sensitive tummy and we haven’t had any bad times due this food. So as far as we’re concerned, this is good dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MADE OUR DOGS SICK!
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our dogs this food for the past year, without issues, and they've recently had bad diarrhea, and my pitbull is starting to lose her fur. Never had problems until recently. Found out that they started outsourcing from China, and have had multiple recalls. One including melting plastic and mold. Never again will I feed this to my dog. We switched to Nature's Recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Senior Pup Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My old gal has been having trouble chewing typical dog food for a while. I was having to add water to soften. These Mini Chunks have been a hit! Sometimes I still add water, but she usually eats them right up! Video included for your amusement - she was feeling a little camera shy. 😂 She's a 13 year old 45 lb heeler. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Great Food!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and I love the price. Their poops are firm and they never have gas. I foster old dogs and this helps to put much-needed weight on them without causing too much gastric upset. The small kibble is easy for old dogs with iffy teeth to chew, especially when soaked in warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for all dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 fur babies, one who is definitely picky and will eat her food a few times and next feeding turn her nose up and walk away. My other little lady will eat most anything. I have tried many brands of dog food and find that both dogs eat this dog food over a long period of time with the same gusto. My picky eater comes running for her food and cleans her bowl so definitely give this a try. Win, win for all types of eaters.
customer_reviews.author: erj123

customer_reviews.title: Luna loves Nutro. She hates Pedigree.
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a fur baby who was being fed Pedigree. She would not eat the Pedigree. I bought this and she loves it. She has doubled her food intake. It's healthy for her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My small dog needed something that she could easily chew and my large dog is happy with pretty much anything. The small bites are a perfect balance for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty for my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large dogs one is a rescue and will eat anything, the other is a collie and a pokey eater. This is the first dog food my collie really loves! I have been looking for a quality dog food in a decent price range and this one is the winner!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Trying to feed my dogs healthier food.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because there was a coupon. My dogs seemed to like it and it's grain free which was a plus. I don't think I'll be paying full price for it though as Sam's Club has a grain free option that's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Layne A. Carver

customer_reviews.title: Chai loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Chai loves this brand the most I went thru 30 different bags for this little jack Russell! Gosh went back to urto and saw this one and she loved it..phew! I have been feeding all my dogs Nutro in past years.... its best and reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Hippievegan

customer_reviews.title: Great for teeth coat energy and overall good health
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years with small dog since he had sensitive stomach. He still loves it and does well with it. He is 11 yrs old now and his teeth and coat and overall health are great. So thankful for this product and its reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Review

customer_reviews.title: Becoming hard to find
customer_reviews.text: One of the few dry foods that my dog will eat without fail. She loves MAX and it's good for her. Have fed MAX to all of my previous dogs but can't find it in my local stores anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Alfred

customer_reviews.title: My 2 dogs love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs love this dog food. It couldn't be more convenient to order this online instead of going out to the pet store. The product comes in a few days! Price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food so far
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Rocky, seems to prefer this food over his previous food, Blue Wilderness. Quality ingredients, small size, and a great price. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David Stidham

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have eaten this for the last 10 years. Even my pup that is missing some teeth enjoys these mini morsels! Love that I can get it delivered to my house cheaper than driving to the nearest pet food store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this food and can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this food and can’t beat the price. I always get this at Petsmart but it’s so much cheaper on here and I don’t even have to leave the house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low Residue Food- great for multiple dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Great food for a multi-dog household. Excellent product, well tolerated and liked by dogs.
customer_reviews.author: G Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with a sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.text: First dog food that didn't give my dog the runs!
customer_reviews.author: lizlemon

customer_reviews.title: Grain free and my 2 dogs love Nutro
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my dogs Nutro grain free dog food. The last time I took my dogs to the vet he said grain free wasn't no longer good for dogs. He gave me a pamphlet on how it causes heart failure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: My pups gobbled up this food. Also I have done my research on doggie food and I feel very good about giving my pups this food. Good price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Dead rat
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been feeding this food to our dogs for a couple months and just found a dead rat in it after opening a new bag! You can tell the rats been dead for a while. I regret giving this to my dogs and would not recommend it to anyone due to health and safety concerns. I requested a refund for the two bags I ordered and no one has gotten back to me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kile Harris Lee

customer_reviews.title: why discontinued?
customer_reviews.text: my dachshunds love this food and they are a very picky type of dog! so sorry it is discontinued!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: The price was right although, dog wouldn't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as it was a great value/price. The dog would not eat it at all. I'm not sure if it was the shape being different from the nutro chicken/sweet potatoe or what but he wouldn't eat his meals as it was mixed with his regular nutro brand. So it may have just been him not wanting change whereas he begged for treats instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Palmer

customer_reviews.title: hey the CEO probably got a nice bonus for
customer_reviews.text: been using it for years, other than losing 5lbs in the bag its ok, hey the CEO probably got a nice bonus for that
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food! All natural, and my dogs do well on it. However, if the price keeps going up it will be out of my price range
customer_reviews.author: Quilter

customer_reviews.title: I personally did not eat it so I asked my ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not eat it so I asked my dog what his opinion was and he gave the following review....”woof woof woof woof woof”. Now I am paraphrasing and I am sure I lost something in translation, but I think he likes it. He has been eating it for years and not once have I heard him complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: We cycle between the chicken and the beef to give her diet some variety, but she's never turned it down. Good food, good price. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years, dog love it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried others, but my mut is a picky eater and will only eat Nutro
customer_reviews.author: R. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: When I swear, I swear by nutro max.
customer_reviews.text: I used science diet in the eighties. Started using nutro max about 1992. I use nutro max and NO table scraps. My dogs are shiny,energetic,and live a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ken ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great food for a great price and easy for my small dogs to eat.
customer_reviews.author: SimonAngel

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs have been eating this for years. The price is the best on amazon. They really like it.
customer_reviews.author: swimgal23

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it over every other food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and dont get sick of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs didn't care for it. I had to mix with something.
customer_reviews.author: TxMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived on-time and great price compared to other big box stores. Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was nice having it delivered to my door
customer_reviews.text: Yes. It was nice having it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pellom

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy packaging
customer_reviews.text: The dog food is great and it's the cheapest price I've found but the package came ripped and taped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog. Food.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this more than any other. I do find it funny that Amazon wants me to rate the flavor. I decided not to try it. Both of my dogs give it two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Public Service Annoucement

customer_reviews.title: Thankful
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog food. So happy I can get it in Amazon after my local Big R stopped carrying.
customer_reviews.author: KVD

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce waste.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this brand for our little dogs for several years. No complaints and they still love it.
customer_reviews.author: joseph hehle

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my Basset Hounds they love it. When I ordered a 25 pound bag, it comes on time. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marezine works great for me.

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. her coat is so shiny. Delivery is always fast.
customer_reviews.author: EZ duz it

customer_reviews.title: only thing my dogs will touch
customer_reviews.text: tried a different brand when I ran out, the store quit selling it . dogs wanted nothing to do with any other food. made them physically sick.
customer_reviews.author: gary knight

customer_reviews.title: Nutro Max
customer_reviews.text: This the only brand that will feed my dogs. Great stuff, shipped right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food! One of my dogs has sensitive skin and it has really helped stop his itching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would HIGHLY recommend. Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Saved money, didn't have to go to PetSmart or even leave the house. Would HIGHLY recommend. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rowland

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it, great quality food! Wish it was available in a 35lb or better 50lb bag!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: What is good dog food?
customer_reviews.text: Dog really doesn’t like but I do t know what else to try.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: The only dog food that I use for my pups!
customer_reviews.text: The only dog food that I use for my pups who are very food sensitive. Amazon delivery makes it even more convenient with home delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my yorkie and so much better for them!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Filippelli

customer_reviews.title: Colony of ants in bag.
customer_reviews.text: The bag had a small tear... Had a colony of small ants in bag. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: dwesley

customer_reviews.title: When I bought a dfferent nutro food, my dog was very unhappy and would not eat.
customer_reviews.text: After I ordered Max ( not available in stores) and received it my doggie is happy again and eats her food to the last bite.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmina Rooyakkers

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good higher quality food
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good higher quality food. I only try to give my dogs the best and this ranks right up there.
customer_reviews.author: OC/1251

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price when you subscribe
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. Other brands seem to give them gas.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Marty

customer_reviews.title: Buying Local
customer_reviews.text: I live in Lebanon, TN, and this is hometown vittle! Good quality food for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Wins

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog with a sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it-we love that it's available on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this dog food! It’s the only one they will eat
customer_reviews.author: Chris vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog has skin issues and this has really helps to keep his itching down!
customer_reviews.author: Cabell B.

customer_reviews.title: Package was opened
customer_reviews.text: This package was opened at the bottom and taped back up .I expect a full refund .also there is a date that has been rubbed off the package and had a new one stamped over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nutro Is One Of The Best
customer_reviews.text: Nutro is a fine balance of quality and value. Our dog loves this stuff and you can tell it was made with quality ingredients. None of the fillers and poison in the other brands like Pedigree, etc
customer_reviews.author: Wade Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: This is all we have ever fed our rescued dog, and she is very healthy. Most days she is still just as frisky as she was when we got her 11 years ago! The mini chunks have become even smaller in the past year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Treasure Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes this
customer_reviews.text: I've never tasted it, but the dog likes it, especially because it contains no corn and is tiny little chunks.
customer_reviews.author: bekki speeks

customer_reviews.title: You could eat it even if you had to
customer_reviews.text: Personally I would only give it like two and a half stars for flavor based on the piece that I tasted but our dogs would definitely give it 4 and 1/2 to 5 stars our dogs like it they are beaucerons and make him be picky sometime but this food they've eaten the longest so far without any of getting burnt out on it. You read the ingredients I'm not a dietitian for animals or a scientist or anything but the ingredients seemed really good to me like I would have faith in eating this stuff if it come down to survival
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barber

product_meta.title: NUTRO MAX Mini Chunks Dry Dog Food, Chicken
product_meta.description: Size:25 lb.Now your dog's favorite NUTRO MAX Natural Dog Food comes in a smaller kibble for easy chewing. NUTRO MAX Adult Recipe With Farm Raised Chicken Mini Chunk Dry Dog Food is all natural and is formulated with added vitamins and minerals to provide complete and balanced nutrition. Your dog will love the savory flavors of real chicken and whole grains in our natural dog food, and you will like that NUTRO MAX Adult Dog Food never contains chicken by-product meal, corn, wheat or soy protein. So whether you're looking for a natural, affordable dog food or small kibble, NUTRO MAX Adult Recipe With Farm Raised Chicken Mini Chunk Food for Dogs is a great-tasting, nutritious recipe your adult dog is sure to love! Ingredients: Chicken Meal, Whole Grain Sorghum, Brewers Rice, Chicken Fat (preserved with mixed Tocopherols), Dehydrated Alfalfa Meal, Chicken, Peas, Flaxseed, Natural Flavor, Whole Brown Rice, Whole Grain Oatmeal, Chickpeas, Potassium Chloride, Choline Chloride, DL-Methionine, Salt, Zinc Sulfate, Niacin Supplement, Biotin, Vitamin E Supplement, d-Calcium Pantothenate, Riboflavin Supplement (Vitamin B2), Vitamin B12 Supplement, Iron Amino Acid Chelate, Copper Amino Acid Chelate, Selenium Yeast, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), Manganese Amino Acid Chelate, Vitamin A Supplement, Thiamine Mononitrate (Vitamin B1), Vitamin D3 Supplement, Potassium Iodide, Folic Acid, Rosemary Extract, Decaffeinated Green Tea Extract, Spearmint Extract.
feature_bullets: Contains One (1) 25 Lb. Bag Of Nutro Max Adult Mini Chunk Dry Dog Food With Farm Raised Chicken
Nutro Max Mini Chunk Dog Food Features A Smaller Kibble Size For Easier Chewing
Our Great-Tasting, Quality Food For Adult Dogs Is Made With Farm-Raised Chicken, Plus Whole Grains As A Nutritious Source Of Fiber
Our All Natural, Affordable Dog Food Contains No Artificial Flavors Or Preservatives
Nutro Max Dog Food Is Responsibly Made In The U.S.A. In Our Own Facilities
